description: A kingdom island in the New World ruled by Donquixote Doflamingo. Known as the 'Country of Love, Passion, and Toys,' it appears to be a vibrant paradise but hides dark secrets.

keyEvents.title: Dressrosa Revealed as Donquixote Base
keyEvents.description: Dressrosa is shown as the base of operations for Donquixote Doflamingo and his crew. The palace where the executives meet is revealed.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the main setting for the Dressrosa Arc, which will be the longest arc location in the series.

reveals.information: First appearance as kingdom ruled by Doflamingo

description: The royal palace of Dressrosa where Donquixote Doflamingo resides and conducts meetings with his top executives.

keyEvents.title: Executive Meeting at Doflamingo's Palace
keyEvents.description: The top executives of the Donquixote Pirates gather at the palace for a meeting where Doflamingo reveals the Mera Mera no Mi.
keyEvents.significance: First view of Doflamingo's headquarters and the seat of his power in Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Mera Mera no Mi Revealed at Palace
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo unveils the Mera Mera no Mi to his executives at the palace, explaining his plan to use it in the tournament.
keyEvents.significance: The palace becomes the location of one of the arc's most significant reveals.

description: A large colosseum on Dressrosa where gladiatorial tournaments are held. Supervised by Diamante, it will host the tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi.

keyEvents.title: Corrida Colosseum Tournament Announced
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo announces that the Corrida Colosseum will host a tournament with the Mera Mera no Mi as the prize, supervised by Diamante.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the tournament subplot that becomes a major parallel storyline throughout the Dressrosa Arc.

reveals.information: Will host tournament for Mera Mera no Mi

description: The new headquarters of the Marines after the timeskip, relocated to the New World. Command center for Fleet Admiral Sakazuki.

keyEvents.title: Warlords Roster Announced at Marine HQ
keyEvents.description: Commodore Brannew gives a presentation about the current Seven Warlords roster, revealing Buggy's appointment and discussing Doflamingo's resignation.
keyEvents.significance: Marine Headquarters serves as the location for important world-building exposition about the power structure.

keyEvents.title: Sakazuki Dispatches Fujitora from Marine HQ
keyEvents.description: Fleet Admiral Sakazuki decides to dispatch Admiral Fujitora to deal with the Dressrosa situation.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Marines' command structure and their response to major threats.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, a brigantine-sloop hybrid designed by Franky. Currently sailing toward Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Den Den Mushi Call to Doflamingo
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats contact Doflamingo from the Thousand Sunny to arrange the Caesar Clown exchange.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the base where critical decisions are made about approaching Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Law Explains Plan on Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: During breakfast on the Thousand Sunny, Law explains the strategy to destroy the SMILE Factory.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the planning headquarters for the alliance's Dressrosa operation.
